title: Asymptotic Notations
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Mathematical notations to describe growth.
- **Big O (O)**: Worst case ceiling. "It won't take longer than this."
- **Omega (Ω)**: Best case floor. "It will take at least this long."
- **Theta (Θ)**: Average/Tight. "It takes exactly this order of magnitude."

common_mistakes.correction: Industry usually speaks in Big O terms (Worst case is what we fear).
